title: Paranet Concepts
description: The Paranet is an innovative Internet overlay designed to support distributed intelligence and autonomy, developed by Otonoma as outlined in "Paranet: The Automation Platform for the Autonomous Internet" by Jim Harding, February 2025. It represents a paradigm shift from traditional computing models, enabling a network of autonomous actors to collaborate, reason, and adapt in dynamic environments. This document introduces the core concepts that define the Paranet, providing a foundation for understanding its architecture, functionality, and potential impact.
